boat.construction_details: GRP HULL WITH SHEATHED PLY DECKS
boat.full_description: Dora has been in my ownership for 10 years and was kept in France  and has taken part in the Semain du Golfe in Morbihan on a number of occasions. More recently she has been moored in Dartmouth. The original engine, an AC1W CUB has unfortunately died. Until a new engine is fitted an outboard motor is attached to a stern bracket. Her rig is unusual as the Heard boats are predominantly Gaff Rigged. I think the bow sprit was fitted by the last owner with its Wykeham and Martin Bronze furling gear. It makes for a very pretty boat.
boat.name: DORA
boat.short_description: DORA is an 18ft Mevagisey Tosher constructed by Heards in 1972 with a small enclosed cabin.
